nodes.text: The Battle of Jendorn was a battle of the Thrawn campaign. The Galactic Empire captured the planet planet Jendorn.

In 9 ABY, the Borderland Regions planet Jendorn was the site of a battle between forces of the Galactic Empire and the New Republic. The Empire won and subsequently occupied the city of Bruzion, where they set up a prison compound and held six downed New Republic pilots.
Gottu and Idow of the Page's Commandos were inserted by the New Republic into Bruzion and rescued the six pilots.
